mapper.update: update t_product_price_list set t_product_price_list_id=#{productPriceListId}, t_product_price_id=#{productPriceId}, t_product_sku_id=#{productSkuId}, costprice=#{costPrice}, tshtprice=#{tshPrice}, tb=#{tb}, marketprice=#{marketPrice}, staus=#{staus} where t_product_price_list_id=#{productPriceListId};
mapper.select: select t_product_price_list_id as productPriceListId, t_product_price_id as productPriceId, t_product_sku_id as productSkuId, costprice as costPrice, tshtprice as tshPrice, tb, marketprice as marketPrice, staus from t_product_price_list where t_product_price_list_id=#{productPriceListId};
